name: Morning Tew - Prototype
description:
Aim, dash, and shoot projectiles in slo-mo in this Metroidvania prototype.

More features and tweaks planned!

Made in one month for https://itch.io/jam/metroidvania-month-6!

There's 1 required boss and 2 hidden ones, as well as a number of pickups.

Controls:

  • WASD and space for movement
  • Right click to aim
  • Left click to shoot
  • Shift to dash

All art and music were created from scratch.

Music made in ModBox and Art made in Krita.

Made by Xcissors and BobTheSheriff
